headline.main: Almagro, Bellucci Advance at Swedish Open
headline.print_headline: Almagro, Bellucci Advance at Swedish Open

docs.snippet: Nicolas Almagro upset fifth-seeded Fernando Verdasco 6-4, 1-6, 7-5 in an all-Spanish contest on clay to reach the second round of the Swedish Open on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nicolas Almagro upset fifth-seeded Fernando Verdasco 6-4, 1-6, 7-5 in an all-Spanish contest on clay to reach the second round of the Swedish Open on Tuesday.

headline.main: More Trouble Than Jobs at Economic Agency Walker Championed
headline.print_headline: More Trouble Than Jobs at Economic Agency Walker Championed

docs.snippet: As Gov. Scott Walker begins his presidential campaign, he is confronting a stream of embarrassing revelations from a jobs agency once billed as the centerpiece of his plan to bring 250,000 jobs to Wisconsin....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Gov. Scott Walker begins his presidential campaign, he is confronting a stream of embarrassing revelations from a jobs agency once billed as the centerpiece of his plan to bring 250,000 jobs to Wisconsin.

headline.main: Two More Democratic Senators Join Puerto Rico Bankruptcy Push
headline.print_headline: Two More Democratic Senators Join Puerto Rico Bankruptcy Push

docs.snippet: Another two Democratic senators have agreed to co-sponsor a bill that would allow Puerto Rico's municipalities to use Federal bankruptcy laws, the U.S. territory's representative in Congress Pedro Pierluisi said in a statement on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Another two Democratic senators have agreed to co-sponsor a bill that would allow Puerto Rico's municipalities to use Federal bankruptcy laws, the U.S. territory's representative in Congress Pedro Pierluisi said in a statement on Tuesday.

headline.main: Rand Paul Takes a Match to the Tax Code. And a Wood Chipper. And a Chainsaw.

docs.snippet: Senator Rand Paul, in an attempt to reignite his presidential campaign, released a video in which he set the United States tax code on fire to show how serious he is about overhauling it....
docs.abstract: Senator Rand Paul, in an attempt to reignite his presidential campaign, released a video in which he set the United States tax code on fire to show how serious he is about overhauling it.

headline.main: A Look at Colorado's Record on the Death Penalty

headline.main: Broadway's 'Fiddler on the Roof' Star Theodore Bikel Dead at 91
headline.print_headline: Broadway's 'Fiddler on the Roof' Star Theodore Bikel Dead at 91

docs.snippet: Actor Theodore Bikel, who originated the stage role of Captain von Trapp in "The Sound of Music" but was best known for starring as Tevye, the poor Jewish milkman, in the Broadway hit musical "Fiddler on the Roof," died on Tuesday at age 91....
docs.lead_paragraph: Actor Theodore Bikel, who originated the stage role of Captain von Trapp in "The Sound of Music" but was best known for starring as Tevye, the poor Jewish milkman, in the Broadway hit musical "Fiddler on the Roof," died on Tuesday at age 91.

headline.main: Bank of England's Carney Sees Rate Decision Around Turn of Year
headline.print_headline: Bank of England's Carney Sees Rate Decision Around Turn of Year

docs.snippet: The Bank of England will need to decide around the turn of the year whether the time is right to start to raise interest rates from their current record low, Governor Mark Carney said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Bank of England will need to decide around the turn of the year whether the time is right to start to raise interest rates from their current record low, Governor Mark Carney said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Mexican Man Leaves Denver Church Sanctuary After 9 Months
headline.print_headline: Mexican Man Leaves Denver Church Sanctuary After 9 Months

docs.snippet: A Mexican man who has been living in a Denver church's basement for nine months to avoid deportation walked away Tuesday, saying immigration officials told him he is no longer a priority for deportation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Mexican man who has been living in a Denver church's basement for nine months to avoid deportation walked away Tuesday, saying immigration officials told him he is no longer a priority for deportation.
